meta.name: Ms. Pat Settles It
meta.description: Comedian Ms. Pat takes the bench to rule on real cases -- where real-life relationships hang in the balance -- with help from a wise(cracking) jury of friends, family and guest comics.

videos.title: The Twin, the Ex & the Karaoke Queen
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three crazy cases including a lease dispute with a wannabe karaoke star, an ex-hubby crashes the family minivan he didn't pay for, & one twin sticks the other with a sky-high phone bill after her Dominican Republic girls' trip.

videos.title: Cousins, Clout & Crazy Glue
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases: cousins clashing over unpaid wedding catering services, a BFF who glued her friend's eye shut and left her with an ER bill, and a podcast partner claiming she built the brand but got ditched.

videos.title: From Romance to Robbery
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include exes disputing over a missing transmission with an uncle in the middle, a reneged trade between foul-mouthed church friends, and a curious case of dognapping.

videos.title: Trippin' Over Trippin'
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that feature a wig job gone wrong when one client goes from Farrah Fawcett to Joe Dirt, a boss tripping over tips after his employee refuses to cough up extra dough, and exes debating.

videos.title: Girls Trip No Dudes Allowed
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a disagreement between besties over limo rides and tamale lies, a broken girls' trip NDA, and a busted family heirloom.

videos.title: I Ain't God, I Don't Love You
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that features cousins whose cruise plans sunk, former friends fighting over a missing monkey, and a mother and daughter's dispute over a phone bill way past due.

videos.title: Catfished and Carjacked
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases, including a loan between friends that turns to carjacking, a trespassing incident in which a romp is caught on ring camera, and a friend who wants her loan paid back.

videos.title: Body by Insurance Check
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include unapproved dress alterations that removed breast breathing room, twins disputing over a rental property party, and a husband and wife on the brink of divorce after she stole his insurance money.

videos.title: We Ain't Even Married
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include blown off babysitting duties that ruined a sister's "pasta & lobsta" plans, a couple that loses engagement rings but never their love and a younger brother DONE taking care of his needy big bro.

videos.title: Even God Can't Fix Ugly
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a niece suing her uncle for a pageant loan but he says they are MORE than even, a daughter suing her mother for a questionable car repossession and a little sis suing her big sis for crashing her crib.

videos.title: Poppin' Off Over Popped Bottles
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a son suing his lying-money-mooching-mama, lifelong best friends disputing over rent money and a cousin who took back her bottle service birthday present.

videos.title: Catering Job Catastrophe
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a hairy situation between salon owner and stylist, a woman trying to hook her friend up with a catering job and a poor paint job that dried up a friendship.

videos.title: Vacay For Babay?
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat presides over cases involving best friends bickering about a glam job gone wrong, cousins disputing over a slip and fall accident and expenses incurred on a baby-making trip.

videos.title: Livin' Aint Free
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases involving an unpaid loan between a woman and her sole employee, a barber shop rent dispute and sisters at odds with one another over a missing necklace.

videos.title: Don't Change Your Tune Now!
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat hears cases involving a woman seeking repayment from a would-be rapper, a divorcing couple's dispute over a car loan and a mother suing her daughter for tax money.

videos.title: Synthetic Shenanigans
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a friendship that came to a screeching halt at a reggae fest, exes who are at war over synthetic wigs and friends brawling over a bad boutique review.

videos.title: You A Nasty Roomie!
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a roommate from hell and one nasty razor, an engaged couple whose trust issues got taken out on a car and a sister-in-law whose house-sitting caused a tsunami setback.

videos.title: Shady Sister Swipe
videos.overview: A roommate is more focused on romance than bromance; a little sister is stiffed by her credit card swiping big sister; a couple clashes over a lost social media opportunity.

videos.title: No Benjamins, No Beats
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a social media standoff over an unpaid wig install, a music video payment remix and one sister who refuses to pay the other for a loan because she feels like she's loaded!

videos.title: When Love Gives You Lemons
videos.overview: A business exchange turns into a money pit; exes fight over a lemonade business; cousins fight over a crashed car.

videos.title: Take The Man, Leave The Bags
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles cases that include a situationship turned sour, a mother suing her daughter over a cruise bill and ex-besties who are fighting over gifts, not the guy.

videos.title: A Hairy Situation
videos.overview: Cases that include hairy services exchange, former friends with benefits fighting over free massages and an ex-girlfriend who wants her ex-boyfriend to kick rocks after he returns her kicks.

videos.title: These Clothes Are Real…Real Fake
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include former friends fighting over fake fashion, a social media show turned sour and a couple who wants to make it official, after they solve their loan dispute.

videos.title: Sis, This Wedding Cake Is Wack
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include pals from the pen fighting over money owed for transcription work, exes in a delivery app dispute, and sisters whose relationship is a mess over a hot mess wedding cake.

videos.title: Tinderoni Troubles
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include sisters suing their mom for a car loan, but mom says they got into two accidents in one day, a roommate situationship that ended after a week and cousins fighting over a busted up water heater.

videos.title: Jealous Exes & Cracked Screens
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settle three cases; besties who fell out over a turkey burger fall; a music video that was never shot because the talent looked like Kelly No-Roland; two jealous exes and a broken cell phone.

videos.title: Cuz, You Botched My BBL
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include a botched BBL that left cousins beefing, friends fighting over a dog haircut gone wrong and sisters squabbling over money owed for rap career management.

videos.title: DROP THE MIC & MY CHECK!
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include one bad balloon arch, a mom suing her spoiled son for stealing her credit card to buy  himself a mic, and friends feuding over a Louis Vuitton slide that became a high-priced chew toy.

videos.title: Scissors & Sabotage
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include a gospel rapping mom suing her daughter for making music without her; former friends beefing over an unpaid check; former hair stylists who cut each other out of their lives over beauty supplies.

videos.title: Pump the Breaks and Pay Me
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include a sister suing her baby brother for crashing her car, friends feuding over a copycat cheesecake, and sisters who trippin over trips that never took off.

videos.title: Drippin' & Dippin' Out On The Car Payment
videos.overview: Settling three cases that include co-parents who can't agree on who owes for a failed vacay, a big sister suing her little sister after missing a Drake concert, and a husband and wife suing their dripped down cousin for not paying his car note.

videos.title: Slayed Faces, Fried Edges
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include cousins clashing over a crashed car, a photographer mom battling her client daughter who won't pay up, and an auntie waging war against her nephew after he fried her edges right off!

videos.title: If We Ain't a Thing, Gimme Back My Ring!
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases, including sisters squabbling over a stolen and wrecked car, best friends who can't agree on what ‘treat yo' self' means when it's on someone else's card, and exes in a standoff over who keeps the engagement ring.

videos.title: Kicked out on Christmas
videos.overview: Ms. Pat settles three cases, including a daughter suing her mother for ruining her credit, an uncle fighting with his niece over a costly yacht trip, and a rent dispute between exes.

videos.title: Ghost Ridin' My Whip
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases, including sisters fighting over borrowed clothes, friends wigging out over a hair disaster, and ex-BFFs duking it out over an unpaid car note.

videos.title: Forget the Kisses, You Keyed My Car
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases, including an ex suing her former flame for keying her car, a sibling dispute over unpaid rent, and a promo deal gone wrong between ex-besties.

videos.title: You Stole My Chanel, Go to Hell
My Paycheck Doesn't Check Out
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include an employee chasing down back pay from their boss, cousins butting heads over a suspended driver's license, and a friend who made a surprise pitstop in their buddy's ride!

videos.title: You Botched My Hairdo & Stole My Boo
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include friends suing each other over whacky wheel woes, a sister suing her brother over a dog bite and a client confronting his stylist over a bad braids & a broken heart.

videos.title: Rent, Romance & Regret
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include an ex suing his former partner over rent, former friends feuding over a sports betting blunder, and a daughter's drama with her mom over a trucking training course.

videos.title: Busted Bathroom Blowout
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include an employer suing his colleague over a model recruitment misstep, a mother suing her daughter over a house renovation, and two friends beefing over glam services for her maternity shoot.

videos.title: You Owe Me for VIP
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases that include brothers beefing over a damaged door & lost key, former friends fighting over a pricey VIP fee, and besties blowing up over a beach vacation turned babysitting blunder.

videos.title: Bail, Baecation & Betrayal
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases — exes beefing over bail money and shady vacations, to a circus director who got played by his own contortionist, and a superfan who swiped his famous friend's card for a taco truck.

videos.title: The Wig, The Whip & The Woof
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases– exes fighting over hidden cheating footage & a busted ride, cousins beefing after a dog turned Thanksgiving into an ER trip & and an influencer calling out their hairstylist for a red-carpet disaster.

videos.title: You Can't Pay Rent With A Kidney
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases? a friend ghosting on a floor remodel job, an aunt chasing rent from her kidney-donating niece who won't leave, and a pet mom billing her ex after her dog got sick from fried chicken snagged off.

videos.title: Garbage, Grudges, And Grown-Up Rent
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three wild disputes: a neighbor demanding payback for trash duty and lawn care, an ex-accused of ditching a birthday bash over parking drama, and a son dragging his money hungry mom to court for sky-high rent.

videos.title: Siblings, Strip Clubs, & Stacks
videos.overview: It's a wild day in court as Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases – from a twerk that broke a Vegas mirror to siblings fighting over strip club debts, and a man demanding payback after his ex-bestie gambled away their catering profits.

videos.title: Botox, Backstabs, & Busted Friendships
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases a Botox-happy mom who spent her daughter's dog funds on her face, a sister who loses her job when her sibling quits to chase a skincare dream, & a comic who's footing the vaca bill after her bestie got hit by a car.

videos.title: Ditched The Bday Bash For A Smash
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three crazy cases? a birthday tradition ruined by a bestie's secret Vegas fling with her friend's brother, a roommate who stole the couch and dog when he moved out, and an actress chasing a paycheck.

videos.title: You Sold the Show & Sold Me Out
videos.overview: Judge Ms. Pat settles three cases: a comic fuming after her friend sold out their showcase but kept all the cash, a woman upset after her BFF wrecked her grandma's Chevy with a bad oil change, and a man ghosted after bankrolling.
